concept.title: Equipment
concept.shortdesc: This is a general discussion of equipment and items that arent' weapons and armor.

conbody.p: Equipment refers to any items that aren't weapons or armor. These items may have some use in combat, but the primary use of equipment is not to kill or protect from damage. Many items however, can still be used as weapons or armor, but they are not as useful because they are not purpose built to do so.
